content: flowerpress blanket a design inspired by the sun-faded colours of pressed and dried flowers with a delightfully soft nostalgic vintage vibe each flowerpress square is completed in 16 rounds and the finished square should measure approximately 26 cm across the squares are seamed with long row of slip stitches on the reverse side once the squares have been joined and a wide border added the finished blanket measures approximately 120 cm x 120 cm
